ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup packed fresh rosemary leaves
¼ cup packed fresh lemon thyme leaves

cookingTips: Use fresh herbs at peak potency for maximum flavor
Dry the mixture completely before storing to prevent clumping
Use on vegetables, fish, and poultry for aromatic seasoning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the user on proper herb selection and drying techniques to create a flavorful, shelf-stable seasoning blend.
